name: crystalclearvision
description: Independent, Unbranded, Transparent, and Customized ClearVision Fork
author: ASilverStorm - ClearVision Team

scripts.build: pnpm run build-u && pnpm run build-m && pnpm run build-dist
scripts.build-u: sass src:public-unminified --load-path=src --style=expanded --no-source-map && postcss public-unminified/*.css -d public-unminified/ -u autoprefixer --no-map
scripts.build-m: sass src:public --load-path=src --style=compressed --no-source-map && postcss public/*.css -d public/ -u autoprefixer --no-map
